content.detailedDescription: The superbowl was on here and had a commercial so i decided to walk out into my garage and opened the door. i stood there and noticed an airliner flying over with a (like parashoot) behind it. i decided to run into my house and get my binoculers as it was traveling fast. i got them and came out and followed it going west. then it turned going south right behind the airliner. after a little bit it went down almost in front of the airliner then went back towards the tail of the aircraft (but was about 20 feet from it) and then went about 40 feet behind it then just disappeared. i think why it left was another airliner was coming up to the airliner that it was following. as it got pretty close to it after the unknown object left. this is the third one i have seen in the phoenix area which makes me feel like i can see them while others do not. but think what ever you want. thanks!
content.summary: Following airliner

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dogs out and a bright blue orb with a red aura caught my attention.  i watched it for a few moments and realized it wasn't a plane or anything i have ever seen before.  i worked for the airlines and also live in a air path for a major airport so am used to seeing lights from different angles and on different styles.  any way it was silent, moved in a slow, floating manner 
and would descend, ascend then go back and forth as if searching for something.  i had time to run inside grab my phone and record a small portion of the incident.  unfortunately the recording didn't capture the colors or movements because it descended behind a house almost as soon as i zoomed in on it.  i waited for some time but didn't see it return.  it had no effect on me except for fascination.  my dogs were somewhat excited, but it didn't effect electricity, myself or the environment in any way i could tell.
content.summary: Silent glowing bright blue orb with red aura moved in a zigzag pattern back and forth up and down, over the tree line behind the neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from harrington to cherryfield on rt 1 and noticed the bright light in the sky.  i thought it was a bit odd to see a "star" this early and then observed the object elongate slightly and get brighter (at this point it was roughly about the size of a penny if you held your hand up and peered between you index finger and thumb).  all of a sudden the light disappeared as if to be moving away from the earth (not across the sky like as if it were an airplane).
content.summary: Bright light oval in shape in sky about the size of a penny

content.detailedDescription: it has happened ever year across from my familys home we never seen  the unkown object untill 6 years ago , then every year after that  we have seen it from the dates july 6 to july 15 th   me and my brothe the first year we seen it called the police they came and told us we seen a weather balloon but we know for a fact it wasnt a weather balloon every one in my family has seen it i had video on my iphone  ,  it is a triangle object it goes from one light all the way to 5 it is very hard to explain  it hovers for about 3-5  mins then desapreas we have seen i-75 the highway shut down looking at it we have tried to follow it every year   it spins in circles the lights go on an off  it could be 2 lights on then 1 then 5  its the crazyest thing i have ever seen a helicopter was following the object    like i said this year i will have a full video of it ur the ffist people that we are telling about this thanks and would like to hear back from you thank u.
content.summary: Trainagle shaped hovered slow  blanked lights

content.detailedDescription: Driving with my boyfriend to the richboro pub in richboro, pa, i looked up and saw what i originally thought were two airplanes flying incredibly close to each other. i pointed to them and asked him, "isn't it weird that they'd fly so close to each other?" upon further observation, we realized that the brighter of the two was stationary. a star maybe? we pulled into the pub's parking lot and watched it. it started to glide to the right, towards the plane, it stopped. it glided to the left, away from the plane, it stopped. a red light appeared on it. at this point it ascended upward. many lights appeared and began blinking. there were two main lights, with smaller red and white lights flickering around the perimeter of the disc shaped object. it began to glide diagonally across the sky, stopping to hover occasionally. it was clearly oscillating. i took a short video on my iphone. i never felt a sense of panic, just awe. shortly after my boyfriend felt as if he was being watched and started to worry that they knew who he was.
content.summary: Ufo with flashing lights and erratic directional change spotted in richboro, pa

content.detailedDescription: Evening before space shuttle launch i observed an object in the sky over the space center area. i called my husband that was a launch manager and he told me to video it and he would look at it when he got home, i took our vhs camera out back door (in port st. john) and video taped it. it had a fixed area it was floating in with flashing lights and then it suddenly took off toward the west and i tried to follow it the best i could with the camera. i had seen this afterwards several times before during and after a space shuttle launch. my husband was concerned because russia and china had ships in cape canaveral waters during each launch and he thought it could be a drone of some type watching the launches. i also was curious about the colored lights on it. if it was a type of drone this was back in the 1980's before we even had them.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo before space shuttle launch

content.detailedDescription: Ufo in birmingham hagley rd doing alian activities in the sky upto no good also winessed by big [name removed/cms/tg] aka the spaniard
content.summary: Flying disc like orb changing colours hovering seen clearly by eye.

content.detailedDescription:
Bright orange-yellow hovering not in formation but grouped
together, then slowly each one dimmed away, came back slowly dimmed again,
no flashing,blinking,or sound.
content.summary: Orange, yellow glowing orb dimmed away slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I and my friends were playing downstairs, we sat down, and started talking about games, suddenly my friend noticed a flying green object in the sky. he started shouting and screaming about it, when i noticed it it was halfway through our buildings, and just flew straight, leaving a barely visible light streak behind it. it was green in colour and moving straight and bobbing up and down. it wasn't more than 5 seconds before it was out of sight, our gang quickly ran up to the roof of the building where we noticed the trails fade behind the mountains.

we went home clueless about what happened, no one was interested into telling anyone about it except me so here i am.
content.summary: Meteor like thing but wobbling and straight, moved very fast, green tail,left a cloudy trail behind

content.detailedDescription:
On my driveway getting in my truck with girlfriend
they were a group of orange lights low in the sky in a triagular formation not blinking or moving just hovering 
a group of ufo objects in the sky for sure
there were many orange glowing oval shaped objects low in the sky in a triangular formation slowly moving in a sideways direction one by one they slowly faded out of sight in the same location they where hovering
we noticed two distinct groups of lights but they all disappeared one by one  in about 2 mins after first one disappeared 
in awe but excited ran to tell 3 other friends in house and totally blown away neither of us had ever seen anything like it before amazed and happy.
after sighting the objects we felt astonished! couldnt stop thinking about it!
the objects {10 ] slowly disappeared or faded out  one by one  right before our  eyes
content.summary: Mutiple glowing orange orbs in sky triangular formation approx. 10 or more slowly disappeared individually

content.detailedDescription:
a ufo was witnessed by myself and at least four others at the red rocks outdoor amphitheater, near denver, colorado, on the night of friday, january 30th, 2015, at 8:57 pm. firstly, i feel that it is important to note that i served as a helicopter crewman in the navy for six years. i have over 900 flight hours, most of them at sea, where i had to constantly identify lights in the distance, for aerial recon. i was also qualified as an enlisted aviation warfare specialist by my unit. i know what a normal aircraft looks like at night, and how a normal aircraft moves. my friend, who served in the same unit and job with me, also saw the ufo. i did my best to take pictures and video on my iphone 4, but the quality does not do the object justice. there were five of us that saw the craft, at least. i know that one of them also recorded footage, and i am waiting for him to contact me with it. i cannot vouch for the sobriety of anyone but myself that night. but i can vouch for my own. i was sober.
    while attending a concert at the red rocks amphitheater, while the performer was on stage singing, my friend and had our attention caught by something hovering in the sky above us. being former naval helicopter crewman, we instantly knew that it wasn't normal. it appeared as a circle of steady glowing lights. eight in total. six green, and two red. i could not observe whether or not it was solid. but it seemed to be, given the way the lights moved together, as though they were all attached to one craft. the red lights were always located toward the six o'clock position (aft) of the craft whenever it moved in a direction. the craft hovered for several moments, then began moving in patterns, stopping into a hover again at different positions around the event. this was almost as if it was checking out the event. this craft was not a part of the event. it did not cast any light onto the event, nor did it remain in the area for very long. i also feel that it may have been too far back for any decent photography, should that have been a purpose for its presence.
    the craft was able to change direction, speed, and altitude as smoothly as moving a mouse on a computer screen. that is to say that it did not appear to be affected by gravity or wind resistance in any observable way. there was also no observable pitch, roll or yaw when the craft changed directions, as would be the case with any conventional aircraft. it appeared to be about 1000-1500 feet above the ground. although, this would be hard to say for certain. at the range it appeared to be, and given it's size that i would estimate to be comparable to a p-3 orion, there should have been no way that this aircraft could cover so much ground, so quickly as it did, and so smoothly, without any pitch, roll, yaw, or decelerations to turn. 
    the object came in and out of sight for several minutes before i observed it vanish for good. i don't know any aircraft capable of what i saw, and neither does my friend. the light formations don't match up with any aircraft i am aware of either. the first ting i thought was, "maybe it's a drone". but this could not be the case, in my opinion. i am no drone expert, however, this craft seemed to be much larger, and much faster than any drone that i have observed. i have a friend that flies drones, and after observing my limited footage, my friend agreed, that it seemed to be faster than any drone he knows of.
    i observed a fixed-wing aircraft in the skies immediately following the event. i could not be certain what type it was, or what its purpose was, given how far away it was. i knew that it was a plane because it had a steady green light on one wing, a steady red on the other, and a flashing red light on the nose.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo appeared over concert at red rocks amphitheater, circled the area a few times, then vanished. seen by no less than 5 people.

content.detailedDescription:
Jan 31, 2015 approx time was 8:12 pm, i went outside my house through the door that faces west abq, nm. i live in the foothills, so i have a good view of lower abq. i see many planes coming and going almost at eyelevel at times. i looked west and saw a weird looking pink/orange light a few degrees above the horizon line. i waited a few moments to see if it was a typical airplane with lights blinking. it did not. it moved in a diagonal direction of south-east, coming straight at me then slowly moved south. the orb-like object was orange circle inside, but had a fuzzy pink outline. it did not pulse, or have any blinking lights. i watched it for a good 30 seconds as it slowly moved towards me in a diagonally south direction. as it continued to move south it seemed to move higher into the sky. i went inside to grab my cell phone to take a video, it was still traveling higher and somewhat faster towards the south. i was able to film a few seconds. it then disappeared, flickered out. there were very few clouds in the sky, stars were visible. at first i thought it was a fireball, but the way it was moving, and lack of speed 
or falling towards earth, i decided it was not. i waited a few minutes to see if it would return or if any aircraft would follow it, nothing.
my impression at first was..Wow, what a strange looking airplane, then the possibility of a firebal, then as it moved south and higher in the sky, i realized it was neither.
the 8 second video does not show much.
content.summary: Pink/orange  orb-like seen over west abq moving south, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: At around 6:00 pm or so,i was driving home from the piggly wiggly heading northwest on carraway boulevard. as i approached 15th avenue north preparing to turn left towards my house, i saw the object hovering in the distance, blinking and changing colors. i pulled off to the side of the road to film the object. although my hand was unable to remain stable, you'll see a street sign on the bottom right of the video that that will give you a point of reference of the stationary object. i was extremely excited and attempted several times to video tape it without while trying yo hold my camera phone steady. i don't know how long the object had been there or how long it remained after i stopped video taping.
content.summary: It appeared to hover in the distance, blinking and changing colors. there appeared to be a tiny plane that flew towards but it didn't show up on my video.

content.detailedDescription: Around 7:30 p.M. myself and my uncle stepped outside to have a cigarette.When we noticed how large and bright the moon was and how clear the sky was.When we noticed a bronze or gold orb-like object next to the moon.Myself being somewhat of a stargazer i knew that this object didn't belong.Then to my amazement it blinked out only to appear on the other side of the moon.This caught my attention and i had my phone in my hand i immediately start to snap pictures. i captured maybe 3 or 4 photos and then switched video it was truly amazing. then again to my amazement the object reappeared moving slowly north and then with great speed and unnatural movement ascended towards the blackness of space and disappeared. i was completely stunned and amazed and scared.To be completely honest i don't know what i was feeling.I hope from the videos and pictures that i took somebody knows what this object  was or if anyone else saw it..
content.summary: Observed a orange or gold orblike object in the sky with erratic patterns and then accelerated and ascended with speed like i've never seen any other object in my life

content.detailedDescription: I was using the robert bingham summoning technique, and this purple orb appeared under mt. shasta. it increased in brightness and then decreased. it was purple/violet. the whole experience lasted a few minutes. i do not recommend summoning, because we don't know what we are dealing with.
content.summary: I was summoning and it appeared and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i noticed from our car what looked like a blimp but it was too high in the air and moving much too quickly.It was 845 in the morning.I kept looking at it trying to figure out what it was.It was going west very quickly.Then it made a very quick uturn and went back west.At this time it turned black.I've never seen anything move like this before.Then it went forward the north because it was getting smaller and smaller.Then it was gone.The whole event was about 5 minutes.
content.summary: Looked like a blimp but much faster.Started out silver.Made a quick uturn and turned black

content.detailedDescription: Flying east to west a huge triangle outlined by static white lights above the cloud cover.  possibly as high as 30,000 feet or more and at least 2km wide, travelling totally silent.  travelled across the whole of the visible sky in just 4 minutes.
content.summary: Massively sized alien mothership triangle shaped

content.detailedDescription: Venice florida 7:05 pm 1-31-2015. walking home with wife. just leaving brother in laws house.Looked up saw 3 orange bright lights called to brother in law to come out.He said they cant be planes no flashing lights.I said no sound either. they continued on nw track untill all three dissapeared into the darkness. myself my wife and brother in law watched intill they were out of sight. i have had a lifetime love for airplanes and could watch planes taking off and landing all day. i was excited because i know what we saw was nothing i have ever seen before.
content.summary: 3 orange lights following in a line no deviation no sound very bright orange moving fast

content.detailedDescription:
I have a interesting story to share.It was may 17 in 2008 & it was a beautiful spring day with mostly clear blue skies.My band was set to perform at an star studded private music event for charity.Members from lynyrd skynrd & marshall tucker were the most famous of performers.The event was hosted at the home of the musician who put this whole thing together.Throughout the evening, every band that performed had a electrical problem with their sound & a few times the power completely shut off leaving the sound engineers puzzled.I was so afraid that when it was our time to perform that we too would have the same power problems.We performed around 4:00 p.M. & surprisingly throughout the entire hour we performed,we didn't have any electrical problems.We were so relieved & felt lucky.After getting off stage & mingling with other guest,i decided i would take some photos of my own.It was now around 5:30 p.M. & the sun was closer to setting to the west.We had the "general lee" car from the dukes of hazard there & i took a few photos of different guest at the car.Within the next 5 minutes i remember thinking that a photo of the mountain side with the visible moon would be a good photo.The landscape of the property was beautiful.I took my photos with a aiptek brand hd camera with a 6 mega pixel photo resolution.For 2008, this was decent.  

the next day,i start to view all the photos i had taken.2 photos struck me to be odd.The first photo was a photo of some guest standing by the general lee car. i noticed in the distance, a solid blue orb in the bushes.You can zoom in & see it better.I'd say it was at least 100 ft away from us hovering there observing.There were no balloons.At that time i google searched blue orb & had only found 1 other & was not satisfied.Now there is more photos showing blue orbs & mostly from ufo reports.The photos before & after the blue orb showed nothing.The third photo after the blue orb,i see a black saucer looking craft right above the trees on the mountain top.You can zoom in & it doesn't look like a bird or hawk.It seems to have an antenna on top of it that is slightly tilted.But it's just not clear enough when zooming in for me to tell.I always hoped that someone with pro photo software could zoom in without distorting it to get a detailed view.

i've loaded these photos up to share with others & to compare since more folks are getting similar photos.This has intrigued me every since that day.I immediately connected this as to a ufo or paranormal experience.A lot of times people will say that around an ufo or ghostly paranormal event that they'll have electrical problems or an power outage & this came to my mind.I also see the light orbs that others report.Whatever these things are,they are spying on us.I feel no need in being contacted by mufon because the owner doesn't live at the property anymore.What you see in the photos is what you get.Thanks for reading my story.
content.summary: Solid blue orb hovering in bushes & trees observing.Saw it after viewing photo of general lee car the next day

content.detailedDescription:
I was comming back from las vegas, i was on hollydays with a friend of mine.We didn´t hear nothing, while i was driving the rented car, and i was looking around the landscape, and told to my friend "look over there, that cloud is strange, take a photo". i hope that anyone can tellme what could be that, i hace check many pages about weather and cloud formation, and no one has this form. i´m asking to you about this strange "cloud" over the desert.
excuse me for my bad english, but i´m from argentina and i´m doing my best. thanks for your help.
content.summary: Strange cloud, lower than the others circular shape seen while driving
content.locationName: Between Barstow and Las V, California

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Into the rogue valley.They travel or descend at dusk and hang around and travel at very low and high  altitudes [possibly landing everywhere] all night then back up at daylight. when they get closer they begin to look like two vertical white orbs with red dots on top and bottom.  when they come down around ground level,they begin to  morph into a weird flashing diamond or a weird  square rectangle. i counted roughly 10 or 15 around the valley last night  at any given time.Some of them  seem to vanish and reappear at random like plasma or electricity arcing.They also   respond to flashlights. if they're drifting away,they reverse direction and descend towards the flashlight.  that started to get kinda scary so i stopped.  this has been my first  ufo experience' so needless to say its been a little disturbing have not been able to get a decent photo yet,going to  try tonight if the fog does not come in too early.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Around 1/28/15 hordes of starlike pulsating flashing orbs started drifting

content.detailedDescription: i seen something in the sky, from far away above the orchard next to la rosa school. i was at the stop light turning left onto eastgate,  i kept looking to the right to see this odd light i thought was an airplane.  as it got closer i was scrambling for my phone to get a pic. i rolled my windows down. it was totally silent and hovered over my car for about one second it was giant. i was frozen. then all the the sudden at rapid speed it took off over our houses in the direction of the air port. i haven't seen any thing like that before.
content.summary: I seen a light thought it was a plane. it got closer rolled my windows down no sound. hovered then left

content.detailedDescription:
Somefriends and i were hanging out and but not much was happening. my friend matt then tells us a tale about some old hippy he heard about and it's relative area suggesting we go check it out. we all say what the beck and we load up and head out. we get there a couple hours before dark. its a large,tree covered, dome of a hill just off the east side of 281 north near a bridge that crosses a water way (missouri river?) about 20 - 30 minutes or north of 24 hwy in independence. we decide to device into pairs and seek out the commune at the top of the hill agreeing we either meet there or return to the car at nightfall. i team with matt and we head out. 

night begins to fall as make our way back. we come to some rail road tracks and follow them west as we chit chat confident they will lead us back to the road and the car. we follow the tracks perhaps 10 minutes when i spot some lights just north of us. thing is that's the flood plane of the river with weeds as high as a man. that strikes me as very odd. i verbalize this to matt and now we are both stationary studying these lights. there appears to be two distinct sets, one set slightly closer then the next and just a matter of meters further west. i would guess they were about as high over the weeds as a parking lot lamp is over the lot and you could see light cast down on the weeds under them. 

there was no sound or movement. i remarked there should be no lights there and i moved to the edge of the embankment the tracks were on where it dropped to the plain where the weeds were flourishing so i could try and get a better view. i could see no lamp post or a any discernable mount the lights may be affixed to. matt joined me and we studied the lights a few moments longer. curiosity getting the better of me i begin to study the embankment and the footing at the bottom considering a trek through the weeds to get under these mysterious lights. no sooner do i contemplate my first step down when both sets of lights ascend straight up into the sky with out a sound and in the span of a breath appear to reach airliner altitude where tasy pause for just and instant before one set shoots west and the other east. with in a second they are out of sight. we shared the experience with or friend's after reaching the car but they were sceptical to say the least.

 the experience was fantastic and unbelievable. if i wasn't there i wouldn't believe it. its almost enough to make you doubt your sanity. i don't know if they we're alien craft but they were ufo'you perhaps others who have had a similar experience won't feel so crazy if they hear mine.
content.summary: I and a companion observed 2 sets of 3 lights hovering silently, then ascend and depart

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) captured a 24 second video of a ufo starship traveling low and slow emitting a brown colored gama-ray beam of light downward, with an accompanying green/purple haze around the object.  first observed a starlike object to the north traveling on a straight line path to the northeast at about 1000 feet altitude.  the starship was quickly pursued by an aircraft as seen on the video.  total event duration of 6 minutes.
content.summary: Starlike object traveling low and slow emitting a brown colored gamma-ray beam downward with an accompanying green/purple haze around the object.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were in notus, id for 3 days camping at an abandoned old house cleaning it out as a job for a friend's mom.  that night around 10p.M.Our relief had just arrived so we could go home and shower and get good sleep.. following up to this night we had been observing lights in the sky, apparently that area is a hotspot.  anyways as we were talking to them out of nowhere about 100 feet up or so my friend and i see a truck sized ship pop out of hyperspace or something, emits this loud sound, sends out chaffes like a jet would, then pulsates, blue, white, i think yellow, then vanishes! i wait to say anything then my friend turns to me like whoa did you see that?! the woman, our relief, do not believe us and end you staying.  i set up their generator and leave.  that night as i'm going to sleep i feel some thing jump on the bed and walk up, my mind telling me its the cat but i feel otherwise. next thing i know i feel this tapping on my chest a bunch of times and i shoot out of bed, fighting off sleep paralysis chasing something,  i instantly have a bad feeling something is wrong with our relief, a gift i have, and run to the door to open it to them walking in scared to death.  they tell me the generator kept shutting off like the power was getting sucked out of it, same with their phones.  and as they were sitting in the dark something big walked up to the car.  we go back next day, and i instinctively walk up to the hill to look down into the corn field by the house... sure enough i notice a truck sized imprint in the corn.  i race down and incredibly find three toed imprints... in the mud... leading straight to my camp sight 20 yards away.. all different sizes... like maybe adults.. and a bunch of little ones... i don't know if we evaded their midnight snack or i missed my chance by the pladiens and a job... ha.. but it was sure a crazy two days.   in my search for other clues i did notice under my sleeping area 6 3-6 inch round holes evenly spaced dug straight down i don't know how far...  ive been meaning to go back and dig, so i guess i'll let ys know.  i guess ill dig where they landed, who knows i might find some bronze and gold crop circle pprints lol.  oh, and the cat wasn't in the house that night.
content.summary: Truck size object appearing frim hyper jump emitting chaffes then vanishing 100' up.  tbc.

content.detailedDescription:
Third night to see this object.
submitting two more videos, and will upload photos from 1st night( 1-27 ) tomorrow.

previous report number 62497 also had a video from 1-28-2015.

flashing, pulsating, spinning sar like object , out in the upper atmosphere or beyond.

blues, purples, warm yellows, whit, pink slight red and slight green tinge on occasion.

1st night was mainly red and green.

this makes three videos of this same object...


someone with a telescope and a camera should look up and get a higher quality recording.   s,and west.

more detail in the first report as to location and direction
content.summary: Night # 3 same object, spinning, flashing colors with video see rtp # 62497 1-28-2015

content.detailedDescription: When i was five i tried to tell my mother i'd been outside and a large disc shape craft had hovered over me. she would not listen to me. when i was about 17 i started experiencing attacks in my sleep and then i would go blind and my arms and legs would be immobilized.It was terrifying and when i would come out of it i would be terrified.My brother experienced this same thing and would plead to come sleep with me he would be so scared. my mother experienced the same thing. she would fight it and at one point it picked her up out of the bed and threw her up against the wall. it continued happening to me but became less frequent as i got older. i would mentally fight it by screaming the name of jesus christ at it which it did not like and would let me go. the last time i had to battle harder. the name jesus did not phase it as it was drilling into my side. the pain is excrutiating.At that time i shouted a name for god at it...Elohim and it immediately let go of me and i was back in my bedroom. after this approximately an hour later my girlfriend woke up screaming and terrified.I had a friend who was pullednoff of my bednas well and refusednto ever sleep in my room again.I believe in genesis six that they are fallen angels disquising themselves as aliens. they are not from other planets they are inter dimensional beings and do not like the name of jesus or god.I have done studies on these things because they have tortured me all my life and read the book of jasher and enoch as well and it all makes sense. their main objective is interbreeding. they are doing the same things they were doing back in genesis and jesus said it would happen again. as in the days of noah so shall it be in the days of the coming of the son of man. [name removed/cms/tg] has a 12 part study on it on youtube [title removed/cms/tg]. they are not friendly that is a trick they play with some whom they can fool. they know that i know what they really are so with me they do not hide under the guise as aliens...Friendly and here to save us. it hasent happened to me for over a year now but i saw one walk across a neighbors roof a few months ago..Don't think he was aware of me then he jumped into the air and disappeared.
content.summary: They came in my room and took me. i saw them come in three of them but after that i went blind.They took me somewhere and drilled a very painful object into my side. i fought them hard. this has been going on since i was a teenager and then happened to my

content.detailedDescription:
First, i am a 15r in the army. attack helicopter repair crewman.  this will come back later.

i was leaving town via the south bridge when i noticed something odd. a pair of cylindrical objects, dark in color and lacking identifying features, flew overhead. these were at high altitude, making determine size and speed difficult. these objects  continued their flight at  roughly heading 060 to 070,  covering an estimated 15 miles in 30 seconds. this is verified by one other eyewitness who claimed they turned nearly above his town. these objects were immediately suspicious, as they distinctly lacked  wings or rotors distinguishable from the ground.  the objects moved with no sound, and promptly altered direction to heading 180 nearly exact, judging by eye. approximately doubling their speed, they exited the airspace and were gone roughly a minute after they turned. the maneuverability i observed was limited, but the single example entirely ruled out fixed wing aircraft, and it's speed ruled out rotor wing units. within the following 3 hours, local air traffic was greatly increased. i personally witnessed a flight of three ch47s in standard army color and configuration, as well as 7 uh-60s or variants, with two sticking out as being a different black than the standard army scheme. these aircraft flew in the same direction as the craft, away from most logical  routine destinations. being between fort riley and mcconnel afb, such flights are not unheard of. however, the strang number of aircraft in a short period is unheard of previously, as was the direction. my friend in a nearby town approached me, believing i would recognize the craft and explain the strange military activity. unable to reach a conclusion, we discreetly (as we both had no intention if being dismissed as crazy) approached a third party whom we knew had been manning a local radar tower in the county airstrip. we came to understand that the objects had a radar signature and registered intermittently. the radar experienced difficult ing in obtaining flight data, and gave signs characteristic of being electronically jammed. however, it is plausible these objects flew at roughly 2,800-3,000 ft agl. the three of us debated pursuing this in a larger city with a larger radar array for it's airport, but promptly decided otherwise. i was not visited, nor was friend a, but the radar operator claimed to have been met by men claiming to be fbi demanding information regarding what his equipment experienced the day after. this visit coincides with the sighting of a single, black helicopter. this helicopter did appear fielded by the army, and in fact resembled a lynx. assuming it was a government sanctioned function, the subject was dropped. that is until it became apparent that animals were missing. cattle had gone missing from 2 owners, who lost 2 head each. i chose to pursue by approaching a fellow serviceman of rank, who responded in a hostile manner and specifically stated that i would be "...Wisest to remember nothing out of the ordinary." fearing backlash or a psyche evaluation, i dropped it indefinitely.

i find it curious that the black helicopter is specified. if anyone has further information on this helicopter that must be linked to numerous events, please verify my comparison to the british lynx.
content.summary: Peculiar coordinating events

content.detailedDescription:
The summer of'76 late night or early morning.I got out of bed and went to the window. over the trees at the far side of the house was a bright white perfect pyramid craft. my first thought was it was a two man ship.The mainbody of it was bright white and spun rapidly but it flew straight. on one point was a blue light on one tip a green light and on the other tip was    white light. part of me remembers a red light somewhere anyway,my room was at one end of the house and when i first saw it, it it was at the far side of the house,i remember touching my eyes to make sure i was awake it was maybe20,25feet off the ground maybe10 feet away from the side of the house slowly flying parallel to the second floor of the house. there was no sound, at first i was amazed then i thought if i can see it they can see me then i had an overwhelming feeling of dread and fear.I ran to the closet
and hid. i remember seeing the bright light under the door and then i'm in my mom's room crying and she's telling me to go back to sleep my dad walked me back to my room and my friend who was sleeping over said she saw something in the neighbors drive way.Next thing i know i'm coming home from school the next day then when my dad got home he tol qd my mom that she should have believed me cause in the paper was an article that said the town about30minutes away saw the same thing i saw. after that she always looked at the sky she wanted to see them too. iwas13when that happened i'm 51now i can't talk about it without crying even after all these years i don't know what happened to make me cry when i think about it still . i do have a lot of dreams about ships in the sky and i see the the tall shining blonde beautiful people. but i had to tell someone about my sighting even though it was a long time ago.I'm still a little scared that the "men in black"will come to the door.  if you think i could help i'd talk to you i've seen triangle ufo's on your show some are similar but not quite.I'm willing to do hypnosis just to put my
mind to rest. thank you for listening.
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: What appeared to be a 2man perfect pyrimid craft  outside my house
